actionable_tasks.title: Add MongoDB Compound Indexes for Analytics Queries
actionable_tasks.description: Create compound indexes in MongoDB to optimize analytics queries, as identified in the Perplexity research sweep. This will improve dashboard performance for frequently accessed data patterns.
implementation_steps: Identify the most common query patterns in analytics.js and insights.js endpoints.
Define and create compound indexes in MongoDB for these patterns.
Test query performance before and after index creation.
Document the new indexes in the project configuration.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Set up TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes in MongoDB to automatically expire old telemetry data, reducing storage overhead and maintaining performance.
implementation_steps: Identify telemetry collections that accumulate over time.
Add TTL indexes to these collections with an appropriate expiration period.
Verify that old data is automatically removed.
Update documentation to reflect the new data retention policy.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Response Streaming for Large Analytics Datasets
actionable_tasks.description: Modify analytics endpoints to stream large datasets instead of loading them entirely into memory, improving scalability and reducing memory usage.
implementation_steps: Identify endpoints returning large datasets.
Refactor these endpoints to use MongoDB's streaming cursors.
Update frontend code to handle streamed responses if necessary.
Test with large datasets to confirm memory and performance improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Integrate Prometheus Metrics Export for Alerting
actionable_tasks.description: Add Prometheus metrics export to backend services for real-time monitoring and alerting on system health and performance.
implementation_steps: Install and configure the Prometheus client library for Node.js.
Instrument key endpoints and system metrics (e.g., request count, latency, error rate).
Expose a /metrics endpoint for Prometheus scraping.
Document the new monitoring setup.

actionable_tasks.title: Complete Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the frontend UI for Spotify OAuth authentication, ensuring a seamless user onboarding experience.
implementation_steps: Review existing authentication flow and identify missing UI elements.
Implement remaining UI components (e.g., login button, error handling, loading states).
Test the complete flow end-to-end.
Update documentation for the authentication process.

actionable_tasks.title: Add npm Scripts for Lint/Test/Typecheck/Scan
actionable_tasks.description: Add standardized npm scripts to package.json for linting, testing, type checking, and Sonar scanning to streamline developer workflows.
implementation_steps: Add scripts: 'lint', 'test', 'typecheck', 'scan:sonar'.
Configure each script to run the appropriate tool (ESLint, Jest, TypeScript, SonarScanner).
Test each script locally.
Update README with usage instructions.

actionable_tasks.title: Fix Roadmap Auto-Refresh Workflow Push Permissions
actionable_tasks.description: Resolve CLI Agent permissions for the auto-refresh workflow to ensure ROADMAP_AUTO.md updates are pushed to the repository.
implementation_steps: Review GitHub Actions workflow for the auto-refresh job.
Ensure the workflow has write permissions to the repository.
Test the workflow end-to-end to confirm successful pushes.
Document the fix in the project configuration.
